groups.name: spring.python.resolver.spelython
groups.description: Configuration properties for the SpelythonResolver, which processes Spring Expression Language (SpEL) expressions embedded within Python scripts.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.spelython.regex
properties.description: Regular expression pattern used to locate SpEL expressions (e.g. spel{...}) within Python scripts.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.spelython.local-variable-index
properties.description: Prefix symbol used to reference variables in SpEL expressions (commonly '#').

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.spelython.position-from-start
properties.description: Number of characters to skip from the start of a matched SpEL expression before evaluating it.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.spelython.position-from-end
properties.description: Number of characters to skip from the end of a matched SpEL expression before evaluation.
